text:
Anybody who hasn't seen Angry Video Game Nerd's 4-part Castlevania review really needs to.

author: AmadeusKing

text:
Mortvia Aqeuduct is also very nice to listen to.
Now curse of Darkness had great music. Overall it was a nice game too but it felt too linear.
Hopefully the upcoming 3-D Castlevanai title will alow more exploration as suggested in the trailers I saw for it.
